strongs_definition: properly to wander {away} that is lose oneself; by implication to perish ({causatively} destroy)
bible_usage: {break} destroy ({-uction}) + not {escape} {fail} {lose} (cause {to} make) {perish} {spend} X-(idiom) and {surely} {take} be {undone} X-(idiom) {utterly} be void {of} have no way to flee.
brown_driver_definition: 1. perish, vanish, go astray, be destroyed
1. to destroy, kill, cause to perish, to give up (as lost), exterminate
2. to blot out, do away with, cause to vanish, (fig.)

Definitions: When the legislature is corrupted, the people are  undone
3.   adjective   Not done; not performed; not executed. We are apt to leave  undone  what we ought to do.
